Contributor: Wilson, W. N., artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "W.N. Wilson." Date of issue based on date of Victory Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: This advertisement is for display purposes only and will not appear in the newspaper. The text describes John J. Kelly, Private, 78th Co., 6th Regiment, who received an official citation for gallantry for his attack on an enemy machine gun nest. People are asked to follow Kelly's example and do their duty by subscribing to the Victory Liberty Loan.  The illustration depicts Kelly's attack on the enemy machine gun nest.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: America's immortals : John J. Kelly.
